title: Sadyr Japarov - Wikipedia
snippet: During the 2020 presidential elections, Sadyr Japarov, according to an investigation by Kloop (the OCCRP's Kyrgyz partner), was supported by Russian political strategists associated with Yevgeny Prigozhin, the founder of the private military company Wagner.

title: Allies of Kyrgyzstan's strongman president sweep snap parliamentary election | Reuters
snippet: BISHKEK, Nov 30 (Reuters) - Allies of Kyrgyzstan’s President Sadyr Japarov swept the board in a snap parliamentary election on Sunday, preliminary results showed, cementing his increasingly tight control of politics in what had long been Central ...

title: 2025 Kyrgyz parliamentary election - Wikipedia
snippet: On 30 September 2025, President Sadyr Japarov signed a decree setting the parliamentary elections for 30 November 2025, stating the decision was intended to maintain political stability, prevent overlap of electoral cycles, and provide the CEC adequate time to prepare, while assuring supervision ...

title: Allies of Kyrgyzstan's strongman president sweep snap parliamentary election | The Straits Times
snippet: BISHKEK, Nov 30 - Allies of Kyrgyzstan’s President Sadyr Japarov swept the board in a snap parliamentary election on Sunday, preliminary results showed, cementing his increasingly tight control of politics in what had long been Central Asia’s ...

title: Kyrgyzstan election: Sadyr Japarov wins presidency with landslide
snippet: The frontrunner in Kyrgyzstan's presidential election, Sadyr Japarov, has won by a landslide, official results show.
